text: This is my go-to clinic—super convenient as it’s just beside the MRT station. Nurses and doctors are friendly, approachable, and accommodating. The clinic itself is quite small, so it can get crowded during peak hours. Best to visit during non-rush hours if you want a shorter wait.

Physician and Staff are very prompt, experienced and seasoned. Dr took blood, one swift movement, no pain. Nurses also responsive and prompt. Overall, very positive clinic, clear queue fast and is efficient! Will visit when unwell.

Doctor is nice, front desk staff is quite nice. Make sure you have your work permit card, employee card, full house address, your email address, phone number because they need all of these to register.  MC will be sent via email.
Very good care from both the doctors and nurses. Thank you !

I suffered a cut on my head when I was rushing through my gate. My son, a doctor working at a hospital emergency department, noted that it was a gaping wound needing stitching. We arrived at this clinic  near to my home, requesting whether he could stitch me up with their materials at the clinic. The doctor Dr Eileen and all the clinic assistants were  most helpful to provide all the necessary materials and the clinic room for our use. They were very concerned about my general condition and took the trouble to provide tissues to help clean up my hair and general appearance after the procedure, a seemingly small point but I am very touched by their empathetic concern. Heartfelt thanks to Dr's Shariffa and Eileen and your support staff for your quick response and flexibility to my call for help!
